News.Title: Rulka Electricals Secures ₹24.4 Cr New Contracts
News.Summary: Rulka Electricals has obtained new contracts worth ₹24.4 million, marking a significant business development for the infrastructure company in its operational expansion.

News.Title: Rulka Electricals Secures 34 Crore Rupee Contract
News.Summary: Rulka Electricals has obtained a contract valued at 34 crore rupees. The company's current market capitalization is reported to be 55 crore rupees.

News.Title: Rulka Electricals Secures 16.3 Crore Order, Market Cap Reaches 55 Crores
News.Summary: Rulka Electricals has obtained a new order worth 16.3 crores. This development has led to an increase in the company's market capitalization, which now stands at 55 crores. The news appears to be positive for the company, particularly in the SME (Small and Medium Enterprise) sector.

News.Title: Rulka Electricals Secures 22 New Work Orders Worth ₹32.81 Crore
News.Summary: Rulka Electricals has obtained 22 new work orders in November 2024, with a total value of ₹32.81 crore. This development suggests a significant increase in the company's project pipeline and potential revenue growth.
